name: Tulp Street Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a financial application designed to assist micro and small businesses in their cash management. The company's application digitizes the physical record-keeping books by assisting enterprises to record their financial statements and profit management automatically, enabling businesses to easily track overall business performance and better monitor and manage cash flows.
one_liner: Developer of a financial application designed to assist micro and small businesses in their cash management. The company's application digitizes the physical record-keeping books by assisting enterprises to record their financial statements and profit management automatically, enabling businesses to easily track overall business performance and better monitor and manage cash flows.
